question: The range of electrical conductivity <katex>$\sigma$</katex> and resistivity <katex>$\rho$</katex> for metals, among the following, is
explanation: Metals have very low resistivity (<katex>$10^{-2}$</katex> to <katex>$10^{-8}$</katex>) and high conductivity (<katex>$10^2$</katex> to <katex>$10^8$</katex>).
